synopsis.text: Unit six of the anti-Mouryou army, disbanded after a tragic incident, is reassembled to combat the wangliang, malevolent beings spawned from the despair and miasma of war. Set in ancient China during the Three Kingdoms era, the Tianyuan, immortal deities, select and empower individuals as Hunters to combat these creatures alongside the Guizhan, beings capable of absorbing miasma and transforming into demons. Ji Ying, Qiao Xun, and Yan Ding, three skilled Hunters, are joined by Xiao Ling, the Guizhan responsible for the unit's previous downfall. Together, they must overcome their differences and unite to defeat the common enemy, while uncovering an insidious conspiracy that threatens to tear the kingdoms apart. With diverse backgrounds and unique abilities, the new sixth unit faces the challenges of battling both inner strife and the sinister forces of the Mouryou King, who seeks to prolong the conflict and destroy humanity.
